content.title: Technical Education Scholarship Scheme For Diploma Level
content.details: The scheme 'Technical Education Scholarship Scheme For Diploma Level' was started by the Department of Technical Education, Himachal Pradesh. Under the scheme, the scholarships will be awarded to students who are pursuing Diploma level Courses in Engineering/Technology including Architectural Assistantship or any other equivalent courses as approved by the All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE). Total number of scholarships for Diploma Courses will be 75 Number.
benefits: The value of scholarship for Diploma level courses is ₹200/- per month for all categories of students.
100% scholarships shall be awarded to the SC, ST, and Girls students.
eligibility: Only those students shall be eligible for the award of scholarships who are Bonafide Himachali and ward of Himachal Pradesh Government employees.

The scholarships will be awarded to the students who are pursuing Diploma level Courses in Engineering/Technology including Architectural Assistantship or any other equivalent courses as approved by the All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE).
The scholarship shall be awarded only if the total income of parents or guardians from all the sources is not more than ₹36000/- per annum.
exclusions: Students getting scholarships from other sources or under some other scheme shall not be eligible for a grant of the same under these rules.
documents_required: Previous Year(s) Result Card(s) from Matric onwards.
Income Certificate of Parent/Guardian (Issued by an officer, not below the rank of Tehsildar)
Latest Bank Statement of the Students Bank Account
Caste Certificate (Issued by an officer, not below the rank of Tehsildar)

faqs.question: What is the 'Technical Education Scholarship Scheme For Diploma Level' scheme?
faqs.answer: Under the scheme, the scholarships will be awarded to students who are pursuing Diploma level Courses in Engineering/Technology including Architectural Assistantship or any other equivalent courses as approved by the All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE).

faqs.question: Which is the implementing department of this scheme?
faqs.answer: Department of Technical Education, Vocational and Industrial Training, Himachal Pradesh.

faqs.question: Who is eligible to apply under the scheme?
faqs.answer: The scholarships will be awarded to the students who are pursuing Diploma level Courses in Engineering/Technology including Architectural Assistantship or any other equivalent courses as approved by the All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE).

faqs.question: Is this scholarship scheme only for the students of Himachal Pradesh?
faqs.answer: Yes, Only those students shall be eligible for the award of scholarships who are Bonafide Himachali and ward of Himachal Pradesh Government employees.

faqs.question: What is the income criterion for applying under the scheme?
faqs.answer: The scholarship shall be awarded only if the total income of parents or guardians from all the sources is not more than ₹36000/- per annum.

faqs.question: What is the benefit of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The value of scholarship for Diploma level courses is ₹200/- per month for all categories of students.

faqs.question: How many students will receive the scholarship under the scheme?
faqs.answer: The scholarship will be given to a total number of 75 Number of students.

faqs.question: On what basis will scholarship be awarded to students?
faqs.answer: The scholarship is awarded on the basis of (i) Poverty-cum-Brilliance and (ii) Brilliance.

faqs.question: Can a student avail of the benefits of the scholarship from second year of his/her course if not awarded scholarship in the first year?
faqs.answer: Yes, the students who are not awarded scholarships from the date of joining of courses i.e. in the first year can also be considered for award of scholarships in subsequent years in case numbers of scholarships are available due to dropouts, failure or otherwise, in particular year shall not be exceeded.

faqs.question: How to apply for this scholarship?
faqs.answer: Online submission of the application form can be done through the website of the National Scholarship Portal.
